posts.post_title: WTB - Graded T206 Scraps (The Uglier the Better)
posts.post_content:
SGC Preferred, but PSA OK too

Looking for the ones that are very dramatic and crazy.

Feel free to PM me.

(Ideally seeking the really wild ones that are all super colorful, you know what I mean)

Example photo attached (I don’t own this card).

Thanks :D
